top.title: US to send ICE agents to Winter Olympics, prompting Italian anger
top.summary: The US federal agency says it will not play an immigration role at February's event in Milan-Cortina.

top.title: 'We all know someone who was killed' -  Iran protesters tell BBC of brutal crackdown
top.summary: Young Iranians able tell the BBC how they saw friends and other people die as security forces crushed protests earlier this month.

top.title: Spain plans to give half a million undocumented migrants legal status
top.summary: The process will be available to foreign nationals without a criminal record who can prove they lived in Spain for five months prior to 31 December 2025.

top.title: Pornhub to restrict access for UK users from February
top.summary: The changes mean only those who have a Pornhub account and have verified their age will be able to access it in the UK soon.

top.title: TikTok US pushes back on claims it is censoring content
top.summary: Thousands of people claim political content is being suppressed after the US operation was spun off.

top.title: Legal action over 'unfair' Steam game store prices given go ahead
top.summary: Millions of gamers could get compensation if the lawsuit - which accuses Valve of charging inflated prices - succeeds.

title.#text: A former Netflix game studio went indie to reach more players
An app developer is suing Apple for Sherlocking it with Continuity Camera
Anker’s foldable 3-in-1 charging station has hit a new low price of $50
